title: T206 graded lot (Nashville SL set, Tolstoi, AB460, EPDG, Sov460, Wheat, Dahlen, Shag)

posts.post_title: T206 graded lot (Nashville SL set, Tolstoi, AB460, EPDG, Sov460, Wheat, Dahlen, Shag)
posts.post_content:
Selling as a lot only.  Price is firm.  PM works best.

$2500 NET DELIVERED

-McIntyre (Brooklyn & Chicago version, but incorrectly labeled as Brooklyn by the experts at PSA).  Tolstoi Back.  PSA 1.5

-Wilhelm Hands at Chest, EPDG, PSA 2

-Hummel, Sov460, SGC 35

-Pattee, Piedmont 150, SGC 35

-Burch, Fielding, AB460, SGC 10

-Ellam, Old Mill, SGC 55

-Shag, Piedmont, SGC 30

-Bay, Old Mill, SGC 35

-Bernhard, Old Mill, PSA 3 (MK)

-Perdue, OM, SGC 20

-Wheat, Piedmont 350-460 fact 25, SGC 20

-Burch, Batting, SGC 50

-Hunter, Piedmont 350, fact 25, SGC 40

-Dahlen, Brooklyn, SC 350, fact 30, SGC 30

Image collage below.  As opposed to linking to 28 images, follow the link below to see my Flickr album of high quality front and back individual scans of these 14 cards.

[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/154802324@N05/albums/72157717601799852[/url]


[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50902703471_4169c1d7d0_o.png[/img]
I'll take it if the first buyer falls through.  PayPal ready

[quote name="pjs3478" post=2063650]I'll take it if the first buyer falls through.  PayPal ready[/QUOTE]

Buyer did not fall through. Lot is gone. Thanks.
if the buyer has any interest in selling/trading the Burch AB, please DM.
I’m interested in the Shag, if the buyer wants to move it.
Interested in Burch Batting if for sale and Pattee
